attributes.action: We should bring in Tamil into the Language Curriculum.
attributes.additional_details: We should help one the most oldest and first language to grow within our society and education.
attributes.background: We should help one the most oldest and first language to grow within our society and education.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

It is for schools to decide which languages they teach as part of their curriculum, not the UK Government or Parliament.
